thread.title: Selena Gomez Has a Crush on Chris Evans
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez Has a Crush on Chris Evans

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Selena Gomez Has a Crush on Chris Evans
text:
Comments The 'Same Old Love' singer calls the actor who is best known for his role as Captain America 'very cute.' 
Selena Gomez reveals her celebrity crush. During a sit-down on Bravo's "Watch What Happens Live", the pop singer says, "I kind of have a crush on Chris Evans ." She says of the "Captain America" star, "He's very cute." Saying that "this is the first time" she talks about it, Selena jokes, "He's either going to hate me or love," to which the host Andy Cohen replies, "I think he's going to love you!" Fellow guest Willie Geist adds, "I think he'll be OK with it." Selena Gomez has just released her new studio album " Revival ". It debuts at No. 1 on Billboard Hot 200 with 117,000 units including 85,000 in album sales. It's her second chart topper after " Stars Dance " in 2013. She will tour North America starting May 2016 in Las vegas.
